title: Fruit Smoothie
description: A refreshing and healthy drink made with fresh fruits.

title: Roasted Veggie Bowl
instructions: Roast vegetables and chickpeas, serve in a bowl.
description: A wholesome and satisfying bowl with roasted veggies and spices.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Chop vegetables, stir-fry with sauce and seasonings.
description: A vibrant and healthy dish with fresh veggies and bold flavors.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef, assemble with toppings in taco shells.
description: A flavorful Mexican favorite packed with toppings.

title: Margarita Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on dough, add cheese and basil, bake until crispy.
description: A simple yet delicious pizza with fresh basil and mozzarella.
